Mia (Jane Levy) is a girl addicted to drugs. She is taken by friends Olivia (Jessica Lucas) and Eric (Lou Taylor Pucci) to a secluded cabin in the woods, in order to undertake a long course of detoxification. To the surprise of all, Mia's brother, David (Shiloh Fernandez), boy away from friends and family for some time, also appears, along with his girlfriend, Natalie (Elizabeth Blackmore). However, they are surprised to discover that the cabin had been invaded, and the basement looks like a kind of altar grotesque, full of dead animals. There they find an ancient book, locked. Attracted, Eric decides to open it and read it aloud, not realizing the consequences of their actions. Mia begins to manifest strange behavior, interpreted as a symptom of early withdrawal. However, gradually, all realize that a demonic force took possession of his body.
